H0.text: On which island in the North Sea did both St Aidan and St Cuthbert live. Farne Islands

H1.text: On which island in the North Sea did both St Aidan and St Cuthbert live. Isle of May

H2.text: On which island in the North Sea did both St Aidan and St Cuthbert live. Inner Farne

H3.text: On which island in the North Sea did both St Aidan and St Cuthbert live. LINDISFARNE

A6.text: Aidan was the founder of Lindisfarne.

A7.text: Cuthbert was a monk, bishop and hermit, associated with the monasteries of Melrose and Lindisfarne.
